id.description: UUID, the unique identifier for the view list item

field_name.description: name of the field in sample.

source_name.description: Null for sample fields, otherwise contains name of the source field is contained in.

order.description: The order of column in list

sort_order.description: The order of column in multi_sort_settings

items.description: UUID, id of the keyword. The keyword itself should be obtained from the metadata of the corresponding field.
